DataElement.preferredName: Image Quantification Reference Material Use Make Standard Curve Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The answer to a question that asks if reference material was used to generate a standard curve.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Image Quantification Reference Material Use Make Standard Curve
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The process of measuring attributes of an image, by human sense or machine observations and experiences, and mapping them into members of some set of numbers or coded concepts._A short note acknowledging a source of information or quoting a passage._The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose._Form from constituents._Regularly and widely used._A connected set of points constituting a one-dimensional continuum.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The process of measuring attributes of an image, by human sense or machine observations and experiences, and mapping them into members of some set of numbers or coded concepts.

Concepts.definition: The process of measuring attributes of an image, by human sense or machine observations and experiences, and mapping them into members of some set of numbers or coded concepts.

Concepts.definition: A note acknowledging a source of information or quoting a passage.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.
A connected set of points constituting a one-dimensional continuum.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Top level term which includes Biological Markers, Risk Factors, and Prognostic Factors.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes/ No/ Unknown/ Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Yes, no, unknown or not applicable responses to a question or condition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

PermissibleValues.origin: LCBCC:Lung Cancer Biomarkers and Chemoprevention Consortium

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
